BACOLOR , Pampanga - Mayor Jose Maria Hizon said a global renewable energy company will build a Biomass Gasifier power plant here to be fueled by grass .

Joining him are ( from left ) Bert Dalusung of Thor Energy , Manuel Tayag , president of San Fernando Agri Livestock , He said the P500 - million facility is designed to produce four megawatts using napier grass whose stalks will used for power generation with leaves going to feedstock for farm animals .
